resources.string:
When enabled shows incoming call origin or outgoing call destination country, its associated map and/or local time on remote side.
 
 Features:
 -------------
 -- Configurable vertical position and time to show the country name and map.
 -- Country name presented in country's official language as well (where applicable)
 -- Configure whether to show the layer only for international calls.
 -- Supports state names and maps for US and Canada.
 -- Supports local time on remote side.
